title: Kha still needs some compensation
body:
So he deals tons of damage to roamers (as ever) however even with the radius reduction he is still not a viable in my opinion.

While I am grateful for this small dose of "we haven't forgotten kha" in many cases he just doesn't deal enough damage to 1v1 most junglers and ganks suck even when going after a squshy like karthas (unless you have 1 full item by 7 mins and a evolution point in Q).

He needs a balancer to hold his own otherwise he cant do much

replies.body: ap kha'zix still no compensation buffs for DFG removal and {{item:3100}} nerf. rito pls

*sigh*

This proves your playing him wrong anyway, in no realm should a Kha'zix be 1v1ing an enemy jungler.
